title: The Chosen Ones: Thy Will Be Done
description: “The Chosen Ones,” is a medical thriller about a women’s fight to uncover the genetic code to life itself and to bring to the world The Book of Man. Mara McClurg has been missing for five years. She leaves behind two daughters who have grown into young women beneath a blanket of lies and secrecy. When the US government discovers that a private sector research facility (GenTech) has broken the genetic code, Mara is sent to recover the book of man.
author: Margery Miller-MonDragon
